examples.example: 经过不懈的努力，他终于实现了自己的梦想。

translate.english: Through unremitting efforts, he finally realized his dream.

examples.example: 经过这次的经历，我变得更加成熟和自信。

translate.english: After this experience, I became more mature and confident.

examples.example: 经过一段时间的锻炼，我的身体素质有了很大的提高。

translate.english: After a period of exercise, my physical quality has been greatly improved.
